Their titles and project roles at EPAM can vary - they may be Lead Specialists, Team Leaders, Project Managers, Project Coordinators, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=0abb4e32-be25-46a7-8730-c8caa5828970&source=PROGRAM\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managers Mentoring Program\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– the main goals of this program are: increase the pace and quality of our managers' professional and leadership growth; raise awareness of managers about career opportunities in EPAM; help newcomers during their onboarding process; increase engagement and retention levels.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Negotiations program\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=dc649edd-fd06-4f02-9f17-2ab5c4479200&source=TRAINING\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"Head to Head\\\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– helps to improve managers' competencies in negotiations and to increase personal effectiveness with a set of management tools.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=be9478e4-d732-4e3a-9fec-2959708adb41&source=PROGRAM\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Management School\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– this program is designed to help lead developers (Delivery Managers/Project Coordinators) with a technical background to become DM1 by title. The program consists of the following modules: Engineering Excellence, Leadership, Project and Process Management, People Management, Client Relationship, and Solution Architecture School (SAS).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are motivated to lead your colleagues and share your experience, please contribute as a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/Become+A+Trainer\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Trainer\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMLND/Become+A+Mentor\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentor\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For all education-related requests please contact the Learning & Development team via\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:AskLearn@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AskLearn@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
